website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for 30-hour play time, but is not rated to be as waterproof as others.
pros: Water-resistant shell and silicone housing make it able to withstand weather outdoors
Lightweight and portable at only 1.4 lbs
Features a convenient hanging point and screw point to bring the speaker with you
cons: Loses clarity at louder volumes, so it is better for small spaces

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bass. Better than Anker SoundCore
customer_reviews.text: Anyone complaining about the bass on this probably making some rookie mistakes: misusing the EQ on their media player and/or is playing poorly compressed low fidelity media. Download/stream HQ media and turn your EQ completely off. If you have HQ media then you shouldn't need the EQ unless you're trying to compensate/adjust in relation to your sound system's strengths and weaknesses. This is a general rule and not just for this item. I tested the bass on this with the following songs: Dead Prez - Hip Hop; The Fugees - Fu-gee-la; GZA - Fame. No distortion whatsoever. This product is louder and sounds better than my Anker SoundCore Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: P. Marnier

customer_reviews.title: worked great. Well here it is a little over a ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I had originally given a one-star rating my riginal comment below. Since then I'm updating my one star to a 5 star the company had reached out to me after I had left my review and has sent a replacement I received excellent excellent customer service they were definitely on top of the bomb I do appreciate then making this right will be purchasing from the company in the future! Original post below Bough this product in April, worked great. Well here it is a little over a month and now it won't stay connected sound cuts in and out. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: you aint got no bass in your sound tank "aukey"
customer_reviews.text: ok mid-highs but missing lows it goes loud and clear (because the drivers dont have to work/cant put out any bass) there is no bass. N.O. bass. aka no bass. if you say this has "bass" you're full of BS, chockfull of bs in your ears. this sounds like it works after 100hz this is probably 10$ in Shenzhen market ... 20$ for stupid american ... 50$ ... lol comparing some pink noise on REW you see the difference. I could have changed the scale of the vertical to make it look more dramatic but whatever. you aint got no bass in your sound tank "aukey"
customer_reviews.author: Peet Peet

customer_reviews.title: Melted while charging
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for 3 months. Then I left it on the charger in my hotel room and came back to a literal meltdown. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: *Update* Incredible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE After posting my review I was quickly contacted by Aukey's customer support. They helped walk me through some basic troubleshooting and when we couldn't resolve the issue they simply asked for my address to send me a replacement free of charge. Absolutely stellar customer service. I am updating my review from 2 to 5 stars because to me, customer service is just as important as the product itself. Thank you Aukey, 2 months in and the device constantly loses connection to our phones and the speaker is pretty much blown out. We never approached maxing out the volume on this thing. bummer....
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Buy this dang speaker, you'll love it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I super love this Bluetooth speaker. I cannot stress enough how much I love this speaker. It has your basic operating buttons Volume Up and Down same button to skip and back functions. "M" mode is an outside mode. The speaker is set to an inside mode by default and when you press the "M" for the outside mode BOOM!!! Bass sounds are enhanced and the music is full and robust. Love these speakers again. I recommend for sure. Buy buy buy..... I have bought 3 so far plan for more future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Goes where I go!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this speaker. I do woodworking at home, in my garage, basement or driveway and this speaker goes where I go. Have a great sound and a sturdy case. Non-slip silicone shell and tripod mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT AND PRICE !
customer_reviews.text: I finally took the leap and bought one of these. What a great buy ! So easy to set up. Built like a tank too. The sound is pretty full. Don't expect a massive sound system, but it sounds really good. I put every genre I had on it. Rock, metal, rap, pop, country, classical. It all sounded good. I paired it with my phone and laptop (MAC) very quickly. For the price and quality, this is a 5 star purchase ! The only downfall is I'll have to hide it from my 15 year old so he won't take it over !
customer_reviews.author: Steve TwentyOne

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the type to really write reviews unless I feel their worth it and will help somebody else make a decision about a product. I have to tell you I've had this Bluetooth speaker for a little over a month now and from the moment I opened it it was fully charged, and it linked with my phone right away as well as my daughter's, and the sound was loud and perfectly clear. I've never heard of this brand before and it is a little more costly than others but it is amazing!! It also offers a one year warranty. So to me it's a win-win purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie23

customer_reviews.title: Crazy tough, Lasts forever.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has lasted me several years of abuse. Now it has its quirks but over all im super surprised it still works. has the problem where the connection gets funky and it wont play. Just tap the call button and press play from the bluetooth device and that fixes it. The battery life is amazing its tough been through half the country and a deployment with this thing. Its still alive
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my 4th one today. I took mine to my daughter’s pool. Between the large open area and rambunctious children I was asked to turn it down. Everyone was impressed with the sound. I replaced my grandsons (broken,different brand) with this and his father was so impressed he wanted one for when he went out in his ranger. So that was the 3rd. This last one is for my son’s Christmas present because he likes to entertain and this is perfect for his need. This encompasses a wide range to needs; sm and compact, easy to carry anywhere, great sound and loud enough to be heard in a large open area without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Compare to the Honstek K9
customer_reviews.text: I bought this intending to buy a second Honstek K9 speaker. I was in a hurry on my phone and visually in the pictures on Amazon these look nearly identical. The two speakers in person are worlds apart. This speaker is bigger than the Honstek, a lot bigger. Usually I would think that would be a good thing but the sound quality on this speaker sounds hollow. The Honstek provides a rich full sound. It is hard to describe sounds into words but imagine listening to an AM radio, that it the Aukey, and then listening to FM radio, that is the Honstek K9. I returned the Aukey and bought a second Honstek K9.
customer_reviews.author: Trading in Omaha

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is awesome. I am a professional musician and I use ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. I am a professional musician and I use this to help me write music and I use it on my beach cruiser for tunes. I set it up on top of my amp, figure out volumes, blue tooth over my recordings to it, and jam away. Clean sound at high volumes. I likey!!!! Oh, and it super loud when I ride my bike. So, everyone gets to listen to Bad Religion and Pennywise when I'm cruising the beach.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: It's Loud, Clear & Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty bulky, but light enough, easy to grip and handle. Has a loop for a caribiner or clip. Sound is clear, bass mode is pretty thumping. Loud enough to blast in a bedroom. Buttons are clicky & responsive. Disconnects after a few minutes idle (that's a bit annoying). Connects easily. Volume & phone buttons serve double duty as FF/Skip & pause, respectively. No issues mixing up functions. LED & Voice indicator. Not so aesthetically pleasing; it's pretty ugly, actually, especially compared to my previous Anker Soundcore.
customer_reviews.author: Trinidad La Coa

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Junk, don't buy! The first one we received would not charge past 80%, no matter how many times we reset the device, moved outlets, tried different cords we had from previous items that took the same cord. Contacted Amazon, who had me contact the manufacturer. They sent me another one to replace the current one and it was still junk! The sound is terrible, it still does not charge to a full 100%. Not happy with this speaker, Amazon or the manufacturer of the speaker!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith-Sattison

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a speaker that we could take out on the boat this summer and this seems to fit our needs... well built, good sound, and waterproof. Most importantly it can last 30 hours on one charge. A lot of the time we'll fund ourselves out on the water and other speakers will die after a couple hours or so. We needed something that could last a whole day without having to bring an external charger, etc. Five Stars!
customer_reviews.author: CharChar19

customer_reviews.title: Worked great a week
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first week but slowly started malfunctioning. I was excited to buy this speaker and enjoy it for those pool and beach days this summer but will be returning to due bad quality. Micro USB port is already rusting which is also affecting charging the unit, even with red tab closed tight when being used. Speaker sounds goes high then low occasionally. Had to reset multiple times already as it turns on for half a second then quickly turns off when starting up. Will be returning this product and buying an Anker speaker instead.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Can't even take a small splash without breaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to use while kayaking. I wanted something portable, loud, and that could take a small splash every once and a while. Sadly, after getting slightly wet (a few drops to be honest) the speaker no longer charges and is therefore useless. Cons: even smallest amount of water will break the speaker. Pros: very loud and great battery life. Overall, If you plan to use this in a completely dry environment it is fine. Otherwise, don't bother getting this "waterproof" speaker.
customer_reviews.author: GeniusofaGeneration

customer_reviews.title: It has enough balance of treble and bass to satisfy your listening
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so loud. It has enough balance of treble and bass to satisfy your listening. I am not an audio person to know the difference in sound but if you looking for a blue tooth speaker to do the job, then you won't be disappointed with this one. It isn't expensive as others but it is good for the price. You can compare this to a flag ship smart phone that cost 800 to one that cost 400. If you are not a person who nick pick over the littlest things, then you can't go wrong with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Hien Ho

customer_reviews.title: For the price, very nice speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is a gem. The sound is surprisingly good for such a small box. I have used it now for 3 years on my construction job site, many trips to the beach, and most recently as a Zoom speaker while attending meetings online. It is very rugged and has a very nice sound. It will not rock your walls or win any contests on bass at the beach, but you can easily jam to some nice tunes anywhere you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Paco Gibson

customer_reviews.title: It's alright for the price
customer_reviews.text: So I work in a warehouse that has a constant conveyer belt running, and I can barely hear this over the background noise. When I walk into a truck trailer then it reverberates and I can actually hear my music. One thing I've noticed about the sound is that it's too sharp, and when I'm in a trailer with it for too long my ear drums become painfully sensitive to loud noises. A co-worker of mine described the speaker as sounding like it's underwater. Overall it's alright for 30 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. While it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, loud enough for music and audiobooks, enough for most rooms (no parties), rugged and splash prove. Great battery life, probably the main reason other than how loud the unitnwasnto buy it. the buttons are a bit awkward to use as the phone icon serves as play and stop and plus and minus buttons are skip for short tap and hold to increase or decrease the volume, still , was a great speaker until after 14 months later it stopped functioning, now I'm shopping for a new speaker. Thanks Aukey.
customer_reviews.author: ET78

customer_reviews.title: Can be better
customer_reviews.text: So I got this speaker for my brother since we needed one and it can be better. The sound quality is surprisingly good for the price the only issue is that your phone must be next to the speaker at all times if you walk away with your phone then it will probably start to cut off so that wasn’t great. Overall it’s good speaker, the texture is cool has a silicone wrapping around itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mn

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Not only is it loud as a decent car system. I took it on a camping trip for 6 days and only charged it before i went and the charge lasted all 6 days with pretty constant use. Plus i dropped it in the river and it didn't mess with the sound quality or anything. it's an extremely durable long lasting loud speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Gaffield

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a couple bt speakers, non of them being name brand. I do know good sound though, this provides good enough sound to enjoy. It's very loud, too loud to hang around next to cranked all the way up. I use it in my garage, bt stays connected all the way through the house.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker ticks most of the boxes and I don't even mind the fact that it is not super portable. My reason for the four stars is, RARELY the speaker would cut out and back in by itself while listening to music. It could just be mine that is defective but other than that I would still recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality sound from this bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: The first one that came did not work but was replace by Amazon immediately and a new one came within days. Works great and I was able to sync with my phone easily. I can't comment about battery life as I haven't had it on that long.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was louder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for summer so we can take it out with us on the boat/kayaking/tubing cause it is waterproof. Havent tested out on the waters yet. Sound quality is good to me...I'm not a sound quality expert so if youre a regular person you wouldn't have any sound issues with. Only thing I will say negative about it is that it doesn't get as loud as my oontZ Angle. Would have thought it would have more volume for the size. But if you are just listening for yourself or a few people it will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Party noise
customer_reviews.text: I work construction and I bring this speaker with me on jobs and it's loud enough to hear clearly as far as it can be connected (a little less than a length of a tractor trailer?) Even over jobsite noise. I keep it in one of my bolt bags and it shakes my booty cheek real nice if I'm listening to anything with sick bass. Feels solid but it's not so heavy that it's encumbering.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR MY ADOPTED LIL BROTHER SINCE HIS OTHER ONE GOT BROKEN. THE GOOD THING ABOUT THIS ONE IS IT IS WATERPROOF. THE SOUND QUALITY IS NICE AND LOUD AND REALLY GOOD CLARITY. PLUS IT IS ALSO SHOCK PROOF FOR JUST IN CASE IT GETS KNOCKED OVER BY ACCIDENT LIKE WHAT HAPPENED TO HIS OTHER ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough for a pool party
customer_reviews.text: We have a backyard pool in the country and wanted music by the pool. This is the perfect purchase. I'm seriously writing this while there is a small rain storm and it's still out there by the pool playing. Sound quality is great. The kids are stealing it from me to use. Neighbors across the pond can hear it LOL
customer_reviews.author: MomOf5

customer_reviews.title: The short cord that you have to recharge with the battery  is very small
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker great sound weatherproof most of all battery will last 30 to 40 hours I listen to mine at a normal level The higher you listen to your speaker for sound the battery will not last as long But I know mine I will have to recharge at the end of the week on Friday listening to it 8 hours A-day for 5 days str8t And when you like a song in you wanna turn it up it will jam.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great portable speaker for the price, love it for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I've used this speaker at the beach multiple times and it's definitely better than any I've had before it. I also get asked about it from others because it so clear while still being loud. it's been wet and no problems altho I haven't submerged it to test my luck even tho it says it can be up to 3 ft.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Honesty

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe the quality of sound for this little ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the quality of sound for this little money. Using it by bluetooth. I couldn't use the (alternate to bluetooth) cable to play without serious static, but I do not care. Also, finding tech support of any kind (FAQs, online) was impossible --- but still I am completely impressed. Bought two more after my first one.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Buy
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure I was going to like it when I saw it, but this speaker runs for a long time and the sounds is amazing. It sounds better every time I use it as the speakers themselves are getting broke in. In other words, when new the sound is great but gets better as they age and mature. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, do not hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: My family and I LOVE this speaker. Don’t waste another moment - this is a product that you need for outdoor entertainment/camping/day at the beach - because what event isn’t better with music?! The sound quality is superior (especially for the price!). This is the perfect outdoors/water resistant speaker. We don’t go anywhere without it!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: well made, solid, rubber covering around case. It has a very full sound, pleasant, and can have high volume. The battery last a long time, I played it an hour a day for three weeks and it didn't indicate low battery yet. I really like it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, it does everything perfect for half the price
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this to the inside roof of my polaris rzr atv/side by side. Exposed to cold, hot, salt, dirt, mud, some indirect pressure washing still has no problems. Its louder than I expected, i’d give it a 8.5 or a 9 out of 10 as far as loudness. Everything else 10/10. The thing literally never needs to be charged lol its ridiculously great. Buy it, its cheap for what u get.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after getting wet.  Great customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I really hate to give a bad review. This speaker really impressed me and great until it became submerged in water. It fell out of my kayak and was only in the water for a couple seconds. It still worked the rest of the trip but a couple days later and it won’t work at all. Maybe I just got unlucky but either way it shouldn’t have happened. Update.. they sent me a replacement. Wasn’t expecting to get one so that was a nice surprise. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome speaker! My daughter was looking for something louder and more portable than her current (which was great, just not super loud out by our pool when guests were here) and this filled the bill completely . She is totally thrilled with it! HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: jennirn

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little speaker. Has some weight to it, but in a positive way. When you hold it, it doesn't feel cheap or like it will break if dropped. As for sound, don't expect to throw a rager and use this for music. If you're camping, having a backyard BBQ, or have a small group of people over then this is prefect. Doesn't distort and the bass is great for the size. Honestly, I'm surprised this speaker isn't going for 60 to 70 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Irishwit77

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach, small room, and other uses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Recipient told me they are very happy with it. Size is portable, sound is loud enough for use at the beach, laundry room, and they are also Aux-in to a TV so it is a mini soundbar. Don't know about durability or life curve of battery just yet.
customer_reviews.author: AMZFan

customer_reviews.title: Constant pairing issue
customer_reviews.text: Aukey won’t stay paired! Sound is good when it works but I have to re-set the Aukey with the provided pin every time I want to use it, and even then it only works about 1 out of 5 times. It says connected on my iPhone & iPad but as soon as I hit play it disconnects. So frustrating when I just want to enjoy some music and end up spending 20 minutes messing with it only to just give up and use my old jambox.
customer_reviews.author: Pi314

customer_reviews.title: Like this Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We mostly use this for audio while streaming video from tablet, so the sound quality is good. Not enough experience using it for music, so I didn’t give it 5 stars (some people are more particular about quality of music). It’s convenient to use, portable, and was a great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: BAILSNM

customer_reviews.title: Works great until you can no longer charge it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome for a half year. Then it stopped being able to charge. Now it is a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Did not last very long stopped working  no sound
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was good.. I only used this thing a handful of times and now it doesn’t work I maybe used it 5 times total. It powers up but there is no sound. I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted to be able to stream the music we play on Pandora on our TV in our living room, to out in our backyard. So I purchased a blue tooth optical transmitter and this speaker. This speaker has great sound. I plan on purchasing another
customer_reviews.author: Christina Miller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I rated this poorly initially due to some trouble with recharging. However, I did not realize at the time that AUKEY had a 24 month warranty. They reached out to me and replaced it with another, new model as this one is no longer in stock. I have to say that I am very impressed with AUKEY's customer service and look forward to trying out another speaker. I changed my rating to a 4 in favor of such good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ninjacamper

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a father's day gift for my dad to use in his workshop. He loved it and says it sounds great. The materials seem to be good quality and well built, which makes sense given the IPX7 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sukairain

customer_reviews.title: Great for home or outings
customer_reviews.text: I find the pairing sometimes is a little tricky, and the buttons are not quite intuitive. I'm no audiophile, but I recently stuck it in my bike basket for our annual holiday ride and blasted some Christmas music, and got a lot of compliments from the other riders about the volume and the sound quality. The battery seems to be lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SBPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from this smallish speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from this smallish speaker. It definitely sounds better than one would assume, and it has a sturdy weight and thick rubberized exterior. We used it at the beach, and it was perfect. Nothing better than Kashmir outside laying under the stars :) The sound was rich and deep, and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: chelle p

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker to listen to pod cast while I’m driving a truck. It works real good it always pairs up with my iPad and the battery last a long time. I’m very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Little bigger then I expected, but good sound, decent bass, remember it's not a sub. Battery life is unreal! I charged it once, and have used it over 28 hours pretty much straight, and this thing is still rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Dust4star

customer_reviews.title: This Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase.. bring it everywhere.. nice to use for working outside or just chilling and having background music. The Battery lasts forever....No issues with Blue tooth at all
customer_reviews.author: Rockbottombad

customer_reviews.title: Battery life 👍
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product years ago and I’m using it as I write this. Hands down best Bluetooth speaker I have had. The battery life alone makes this product worth the price, if anything I’ll forget to charge it for 1-2 days but it charges back up very quickly also. The sound quality is good and it’s durability is insane, I’ve dropped it countless times and it feels like a brick. Very much would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker great company
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my scooter great the sound is loud enough to hear at 65mph but I also leave my helmet visor cracked open
customer_reviews.author: Amazons customers

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: My son destroyed his expensive speaker. So I bought him a totally shock proof and water proof speaker. He brings it in the shower, he drops it and juts mistreats it all the time. He is a teenager and lives in a dorm. Despite this, it's still going strong after several months. Good sound quality and projection too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out of the box. Easy to use and pair. The sound is good. I'm sure there are better speakers as far as sound quality goes, but for the money this one is hard to beat. The volume gets up surprisingly loud without distortion. It also appears to be very durably built although I haven't tried submerging it in water. The battery life is also as good as advertised which is one of the reasons I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: trent richardson

customer_reviews.title: Really is Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item just before going on a camping trip and the 1st thing I did was drop it in the river. It continued to float & play music until I was to retrieve it (about 10 min) and has had no issues. Sound quality is great for its size and price. It's an excellent rugged speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: Best portable and waterproof speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the best water proof speaker I have owned!! I took it floating on the river. It was pretty much submerged the whole time I was on the water. And it still works like it was brand new. Also the battery life is amazing it last 2 days with no charge. Also the sound is amazing on it it’s geats really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Jean-Charles

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. The speaker works inconsistently. It says it is connected on the laptop/phone, but no sound comes out. Sometimes sound will come out for only a few minutes and then will stop, even when fully charged and plugged into the device.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Get this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take on my kayak. It sounds great at low and high volume, and I’ve dunked it a few times, and it still works perfectly. It’s a fantastic speaker for the price
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for a while, and now it won't charge at all. EDIT: The seller saw my review and contacted me very quickly to offer a refund or replacement. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Viladevall

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, portable, hollow sound
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and portable. Sound isn’t rich and sounds hollow. I also have a Bose micro Soundlink and the sound on the micro is MUCH better with deeper base despite it being on 1/5 the size. Bass mode helps a smidge but sound is still hollow. Will use this for those times when I need music but don’t want to be too worried about someone walking off with it... you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker puts out loud, high quality sound. Using it off and on for a few weeks and doesn't show any sign of a low battery. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Dog of Bery

customer_reviews.title: I got the best from the least expected
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to tell where this speaker has been, yet it plays music seamlessly day in and day out with a very stubborn battery that just. won't. give. up. Only comment I would share is that the bluetooth volume sync takes a couple seconds when you turn it on, so make sure your phone/tablet/whatever-you-use is set to a low volume before you turn on the speaker. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this device, The one thing I don't like is a little sound it makes when I press on/off but that's just me. The sound quality is good.The volume goes really up without damaging the quality of the sound. The battery does last a lot and recharge very quickly. It looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Gaburier

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker and like always Aukey comes through with exponential style and the product works great it really feels like a well made product when you hold it in your hands.The sound is crisp and i like the fact that you can change the modes and it actually changes the experience. I have not tested out the water resistant aspect of it just the fact that i am still afraid. I will say this if water by accidentally spills you wont have to go out and buy a new one. Trust me im talking by experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd probably spend a little more and get a better quality speaker
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is OK at low volume settings but when you play it on louder settings, the speakers reach the end of their throws quickly and you hear the distortion readily. Not sure I'd buy these again. I'd probably spend a little more and get a better quality speaker...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey deWispelaere

customer_reviews.title: Sounded like a blown speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker must have been defective. It had two modes, a 'regular' and a 'bass' mode or something like that. 'Regular' mode sounded like a louder version of my phone or laptop speaker, and 'bass' mode sounded like the speaker was blown. Terribly muddy sound. Awful. If this wasn't a defective unit then it's just a terrible speaker. Other than that, it connected easily to both my phone and laptop. But I returned it immediately. Will be trying another speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Machine

customer_reviews.title: Great for office, shop, home etc
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this speaker. It works well and was easy to pair. Battery doesn't last as long as we would like but that's the only concern.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Landon

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little speaker it doesn't put out a ton of sound but it does put out just enough that if I'm outside with it I know my neighbors are going to complain LOL which I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Crawford Himmelberg

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth isn't stable.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but won't stay connected to Bluetooth. Using Pixel 2 with Android 10 (had never stated connected to any phone well). Sound and build quality are fantastic. Headphone jack is great. Just don't expect the Bluetooth to work well.
customer_reviews.author: LukeSaysMoo!

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: If you are worried about how loud this product can get, let me promise you that this speaker can get LOUD and the sound quality doesnt get effected the louder you go! I didnt even have it at its loudest and it could be heard perfectly for at least 20ft going down a loud river. I’ve purchased other similar products but this one is the best I’ve ever had and for the price its unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Cate B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Can't ask much for the price. Its durable and loud. Bass isnt as deep but again for the price you cannot complain. The range is amazing. AND lets not forget the battery life, simply WOW. My phone was in my living room while my speaker was in my room and i was able to pick up calls and the person could not tell the difference. AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Bluetooth speaker, I'd have to say this is the best one I own. I let my father in-law use it and it loved it also. I went ahead and bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Amazing !! Great battery
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BREAST!!! I would recommend this speaker to anyone looking for a speaker with great sound and battery life!! It has a nice heft to it. I purchased it in Dec. 2016 and charged it when I received it and used it almost everyday for a few hours and the charge lasted till late March. It has a screw mount on bottom for mounting to bike or tri pod
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, got this in last week, and I used it a lot outside by the pool and it has held up really well. Supper load for a small speaker. It is easy to set up Bluetooth and come already charged which is amazing. So far really love this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Speaking of Speakers .....
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I purchased. Gave the first one to my father to use in his garage. Very durable, sound is good and loud and battery life is amazing. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: lucybusmc

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't carry this on my person, but I take it on trips, to work, the beach, etc. I've used it a ton and only had to charge it 2 or 3 times in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Eve in Decatur

customer_reviews.title: Love the Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this speaker to take to the lake with us, we loved how durable it is. It's great that it's water resistant as well. It's no Bose speaker, but for the price the quality is great I was pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby G

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid speaker set
customer_reviews.text: Good Solid speaker set. Only thing to mention, There is no good way to know battery status other than dead reckoning. Perhaps future versions can add a feature that allows a smartphone app to report battery charge percentage.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: but as of now it's great. I use it in the shower on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this only two weeks so far, but as of now it's great. I use it in the shower on my shower head rack to listen to Pandora and my wife and I listen to audiobooks with it while falling asleep. Battery seems to last a long time and it seems pretty moisture resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: BEST. BATTERY. LIFE. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this speaker for it's durability, weather resistance, and extremely long lasting battery life. I have had the speaker for 3 weeks now and use it every work day even down to 10° temperatures and I have not yet charged the battery and it's still at 30%. The sound is pretty decent for how small and lightweight the speaker is. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the bathroom while taking showers and also any time we are outside. It is plenty loud and battery life is awesome. Remember to hold the mode button for a couple seconds to select more bass in your audio.
customer_reviews.author: TheBaseballDad7

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for Father’s Day!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for My father in law and he doesn’t leave this little sucker behind anywhere! Loud sound and great quality speakers! We carry it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised great for pool area blue tooth sound
customer_reviews.text: As advertised great for pool area blue tooth sound. Battery lasts a long time and sound quality if really good and you control the volume from the speaker which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: John Blumenshine

customer_reviews.title: Was great for like a second
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for one month then it just stopped working tried to send back but just missed the return policy ugh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery died with not much use
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than a year and the battery died on me, so useless now was a good product but if it doesnt last then... worthless
customer_reviews.author: Jarel GOrdon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound and Construction
customer_reviews.text: Awesome BT speaker with great sound. Sound quality as good as my Bose speaker and actually clearer than the Bose at full volume. Very solid construction. Often sits in direct sunlight in my boat and provides all day sound.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker
customer_reviews.text: Loud! Water proof is nice for when you’re doing the dishes or taking a shower. It’s loud and has a little base! Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth speaker I should say
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Bluetooth speaker I should say. The speaker being water resistant also helps me with my back packing without a worry of rain / shower. The sound is blazing very useful to annoy my mom :P
customer_reviews.author: kartheek

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - great durability. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Super durable and great sound quality! Was looking at more expensive speakers and this one did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: ALYSSA

customer_reviews.title: Aukey bluetooth wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bluetooth speaker. It is very loud and easily connects to your phone or tablet. You can also receive phone calls through it. It is a very good unit I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: skippy

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 1 year than stopped working at all. Bad, bad buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: DUANE L KOCH

customer_reviews.title: Love mine
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. Great sound for the price and the sound.love
customer_reviews.author: correy lopez

customer_reviews.title: Water proof, floats, and good handheld size
customer_reviews.text: Great for the river! Me and 12 other friends floated the comal river. The vocal and base sound was a perfect blend and even nearby people were able to jam with us. 10/10 I recommend especially because when we went through the first chute the speaker survived since it had a physical piece to tie off a carabiner
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality speaker. Gets loud enough to easily fill a 3 bedroom house with crisp, clear sound and a decent amount of base. The battery life so far is amazing! I would highly recommend this speaker! I spent a LOT of time trying to make sure I got the best bang for my bucket and I definitely feel I achieved that.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Vinzant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker with only one drawback
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speaker for the money with great sound. Synced to my IPhone 6s with no problems. Only thing I didn't like was the synching of the volume buttons. I have another BT speaker that gets a lot louder because it has its own volume button. Because of the synching, it only gets as loud as the IPhone will let it. If that is not a problem for you, then I would definitely recommend this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Bendickson

customer_reviews.title: Little Giant......
customer_reviews.text: A sound, larger than you would expect from a spkr. this small. there is a bass boost switch, and the overall build quality and appearance are first rate. I have had mine for about 6months or longer, with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: The "Doctor"

product_meta.title: AUKEY Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Outdoor Loud Sound, Waterproof IPX7, 30-Hour Playtime, Enhance Bass, Portable Wireless Bluetooth 4.2 Speakers for Home Party Camping
product_meta.description:
SoundTank
Weighing in at just over a pound, the AUKEY SK-M12 is the ideal portable waterproof speaker for your outdoor adventures. Dual 5 watt speaker drivers and a passive radiator, powered by two 2600mAh rechargeable batteries, deliver up to 30 continuous hours of wireless audio enjoyment.

Bluetooth 4.2
Compared to previous versions, Bluetooth 4.2 brings you faster, more secure connectivity and increased power efficiency for connected devices (like your phone) when wirelessly streaming audio at distances up to 33 feet.

Portable Design
Hang it from your backpack on a hike, on the inside of your tent frame, on a tree in the forest, or on a fence while you're knocking out some yard work. Screw point mounts on tripods or any 1/4"-20 compatible base.

Refined Utility
Durable high-density silicone casing provides a rugged layer of protection from daily wear and tear. Easily manage audio playback and calls with volume controls, multi-function button, and built-in microphone. Choose your sound signature—enhanced bass or boosted treble—with the press of the EQ mode button. You can even connect your old, non-Bluetooth 3.5mm audio devices via the included 3.5mm audio cable.

45-Day Money Back & 24-Month Warranty
All AUKEY products are backed by our 45-Day Money Back Guarantee and 24-Month Product Replacement Warranty.
feature_bullets: 【Improved Sound】: Dual drivers and bass-boosting passive radiator produce a clear and powerful sound. Two EQ modes: one for indoors, which is bassier, and one for outdoors, which is optimized for volume
【Long Battery Life】: 5200mAh battery supports up to 30-hour playtime for all-day play with power to spare or multiple extended listening sessions. Just 1 hour of charge gives you 5 hours of music

【Tough 'Tank' Construction】: IPX7 waterproofing means the music won't stop no matter how bad the weather gets (it will continue to work even when immersed in up to 3 feet of water). Silicone housing provides shock and drop resistance

【Compact & Portable Design】; Portable Design: Despite its tank-like strength, this speaker is a surprisingly light at just 635g/1.4 pounds in weight. Built-in 1/4"-20 standard screw thread and hanging point are handy for adding a soundtrack to outdoor adventures
【Package Contents】: AUKEY SK-M12 SoundTank Wireless 5W Speaker, micro USB cable, 3.5mm audio cable, reset pin, user manual and Friendly Customer Service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars953 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
